sourcesContent:
<template>
  <ion-page>
    <ion-header>
      <ion-toolbar>
        <ion-title>Map</ion-title>
      </ion-toolbar>
    </ion-header>
    <ion-content :fullscreen="true">
      <ion-header collapse="condense">
        <ion-toolbar>
          <ion-title size="large">Tab 2</ion-title>
        </ion-toolbar>
      </ion-header>
      
      <!-- <ion-modal 
        z.index=1
        trigger="trigger-button"
        :is-open="true"
        :breakpoints="[0.1, 0.5, 1]"
        :initialBreakpoint="0.5"
      >
        <ion-content>Modal Content</ion-content>
      </ion-modal> -->
      <!-- ---------- -->
      <l-map 
        z-index=0
        :zoom="13" 
        :center="[50.9223,11.5723]" 
        :options="{zoomControl: false}">
        <l-tile-layer style="z-index: 100" url="https://tiles.stadiamaps.com/tiles/alidade_smooth_dark/{z}/{x}/{y}{r}.png"></l-tile-layer>
        <!-- http://{s}.tile.osm.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png -->
        <!-- https://leaflet-extras.github.io/leaflet-providers/preview/ -->
          <l-marker :lat-lng="markerLatLng" >
              <l-popup>Hello!</l-popup>
          </l-marker>
            <l-marker 
              @click="openModal(latLng)"
              v-for="(marker, index) in markers"
              :key="index"
              ref="markersRef"
              :lat-lng="marker"
              >
              <l-popup :content="text"></l-popup>
            </l-marker>

      </l-map>

      <!-- ----------- -->
    </ion-content>
  </ion-page>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent } from 'vue';
import { IonPage, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonTitle, IonContent } from '@ionic/vue';
import "leaflet/dist/leaflet.css"
import { LMap, LTileLayer, LMarker, LPopup } from "@vue-leaflet/vue-leaflet";
import { supabase } from "../supabase"
// import { IonButton } from '@ionic/vue';
import { modalController } from '@ionic/vue';
import Modal from './SpotModal.vue'


export default defineComponent({
  name: 'Tab2Page',
  components: { 
    IonHeader, 
    IonToolbar, 
    IonTitle, 
    IonContent, 
    IonPage, 
    LMap,
    LTileLayer,
    LMarker,
    LPopup,
    // IonModal, 
    // IonButton,
    },
  setup () {
  },
  async created() {
    const {data: events} = await supabase
      .from('events')
      .select('coordinates', 'name')
    this.populate_markers_array(events)
    this.loaded = true
  },
  data: () => ({
    spot: false,
    zoomControl: false,
    loaded: true,
    markers_works: [
        [48.864716, 2.349014],
        [51.509865, -0.118092]
    ],    
    markers: [],
    markerLatLng: [47.313220, -1.319482],
    test: [],
    test2: [],
    text: "blub",
  }),
  methods: {
    populate_markers_array: function (marker_objects) {
      let markersArr = []
      marker_objects.forEach(element => {
        let coordsArr = element.coordinates.split(',')
        markersArr.push([parseFloat(coordsArr[0]), parseFloat(coordsArr[1])])
      });
      this.markers = markersArr
      console.log(this.markers_works)
    },
    greet: function () {
      this.spot = true;
      console.log(this.spot)
    },
    // testfuntion: function(){
    //   this.test2 = this.marker
    //   console.log(this.test2)
    // },
    async openModal() {
      // this.test = latLng
      // console.log(this.test)
      const modal = await modalController
        .create({
          component: Modal,
          initialBreakpoint: 0.5,
          breakpoints: [0, 0.5, 1]
        })
      return modal.present();
        // this.test = latLng
        // console.log(latLng)
    },

  }
});
</script>

<style>
</style>
